It would seem the body of the slain Zhélruka was indeed attacked by dragon-kind. Further up the path to the Stormwall, you hear the cries of an angered drake fighting some animal.
Stormwall lies high in the mountains northeast of Skarháld.\n\nYou should defeat enemies in Stormwall and find the source of all these beasts.
Examine the slain wolf
Stormwall lies high in the mountains north-east of Skarháld.\n\nYou should examine the spider corpse you found in Stormwall.

You should defeat dragon-kind on the path to Stormwall, which lies north-east of Skarháld.
These spider remains are not nearly as old as the ones in Glimmerdeep
A large crack in the old hall reveals an entrance to spider-caves!
You should search for the entrance to Stormwall, high in the mountains north-east of Skarháld.
